title: Extra Credits Plays D&D - Stormwreck Isle One-Shot Announcement #shorts

media:group.media:title: Extra Credits Plays D&D - Stormwreck Isle One-Shot Announcement #shorts
media:group.media:description:
Curious about Dungeons and Dragons but don't know where to start? Then join us on Oct 21st at 3:00pm EST on http://twitch.tv/ExtraCredits as we play a Wizards of the Coast Sponsored D&D's one-shot adventure. Featuring "The Dragons of Stormwreck Isle Starter Set" and Extra Credits cast  Matthew Krol, Geoff Zatkin, Kat Rider, with special guests Cake Jumper, and Steven Van Patten.  

--- Miss the stream? We got you covered! ---
https://youtu.be/c09e3cnSwLQ
**Wizards of the Coast Sponsored Content**
